Footer.tagline: The standard for modern, empathetic debt recovery. Leveraging agentic AI to resolve balances with human-grade intuition.
Footer.copyright: © 2026 Meziani AI. Dragun.app is a product of Meziani AI.

Home.heroParagraph: The first AI agent that negotiates like a human, cites like a lawyer, and settles like a pro. Built on Gemini 2.0 Flash for sub-second resolution.
Home.chatBubble1: I understand things are tight. However, your contract signed on Jan 12th states a 30-day notice...
Home.chatBubble2: Can I pay half now and half Friday?
Home.chatBubble3: I can approve a 50% split if we schedule the second payment now. Does that help?
Home.legalDesc: Built-in safeguards ensure every AI interaction follows FDCPA and local debt collection laws automatically.
Home.stripeDesc: Instant settlement links generated by the AI agent. Payment flows directly to your Stripe Connect account.
Home.knowledgeDesc: Drag-and-drop your PDFs. Our RAG engine indexes your specific terms so the AI never hallucinates.
Home.ctaSubtitle: Join the elite merchants automating their back-office with Dragun.

Features.title: Advanced
Features.subtitle: Everything you need to automate your debt recovery with empathy and efficiency.
Features.geminiDesc: Real-time, context-aware negotiations using the latest AI technology.
Features.contractDesc: Upload your contracts and let the AI cite specific clauses during recovery.
Features.stripeDesc: Seamless payment processing directly through the chat interface.

Pricing.title: Simple,
Pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your business scale.

FAQ.title: Common
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the dragon behind the debt.
FAQ.q1: How does the AI handle disputes?
FAQ.a1: Dragun uses Gemini 2.0 Flash to understand the debtor's context. If they claim they've already paid or cancelled, the AI will search your uploaded contracts and payment history to provide a factual, empathetic response.
FAQ.a2: Yes. Dragun operates within the guidelines of debt collection practices, acting as an automated agent of your business. It maintains a professional and firm but fair tone at all times.
FAQ.a3: Absolutely. Through your dashboard, you can adjust a slider from 'Soft Nudge' to 'Legal Firm' to match your brand's voice and urgency.
FAQ.a4: We integrate directly with Stripe, allowing debtors to pay via Credit Card, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or ACH transfers directly in the chat.

Contact.title: Get in
Contact.subtitle: Have questions? Our team (and our AI) is here to help.
Contact.subject: Subject

About.title: Our
About.paragraph: At Dragun.app, we believe debt recovery doesn’t have to be a battle. As a product of Meziani AI, we combine sub-second intelligence with an empathetic approach to help businesses recover lost revenue.
About.speedDesc: Leveraging the specialized Meziani AI engine to ensure every recovery interaction is instant and effective.
About.foundedDesc: Meziani AI created Dragun.app to be more than just a chatbot—it’s an agent of resolution.

Legal.title: Legal
Legal.subtitle: Last Updated: February 20, 2026. Trust, transparency, and the pursuit of compliance.
Legal.privacyContent: At Dragun.app, operated by Meziani AI, we prioritize the protection of your data and that of your debtors. We collect minimal information required for debt recovery services, including contact details and contract data. All data is processed by Meziani AI and encrypted at rest and in transit. While we strive to adhere to international data protection standards such as GDPR and CCPA, we are continually improving our systems. By using our platform, you acknowledge that Meziani AI acts as a data processor on behalf of our merchant clients.
Legal.tosContent: By accessing Dragun.app, you agree to the terms provided by Meziani AI. We provide an AI-powered negotiation interface for debt recovery. You are responsible for the accuracy of any contract data or debtor information uploaded to the platform. Meziani AI is not a law firm and does not provide legal advice. We reserve the right to suspend accounts that use our platform for harassment or illegal activities. Your use of the service constitutes acceptance of these evolving terms.
Legal.complianceContent: Meziani AI designs Dragun.app with the aim of following standard debt collection rules (including FDCPA guidelines). However, because debt collection laws vary significantly by jurisdiction, merchants are solely responsible for ensuring that their specific configuration of the AI (including the 'strictness level') and any settlement offers made through the platform are fully compliant with their local laws and regulations. We aim for transparency in all AI-driven interactions.

Integrations.title: Seamless
Integrations.subtitle: Connect your existing tools to Dragun for a fully automated recovery experience.
Integrations.stripeDesc: Embed checkout sessions and handle payment directly in the chat.
Integrations.supabaseDesc: Real-time updates to your recovery pipeline via Postgres triggers.
Integrations.geminiDesc: Sub-second AI intelligence with 1M token context window.
Integrations.mindbodyDesc: Direct sync of outstanding memberships and debtors.
